ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, This brings up some lingering questions of mine... The Runed Bone Fork is indeed considered part of the DragonWear(tm) line of clothing. What do you high
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm,

This brings up some lingering questions of mine...

The Runed Bone Fork is indeed considered part of the DragonWear(tm) line of
clothing. What do you high level bards put in this slot when not fighting
dragons? (I love my Runed Bone Fork so much, I use it all the time)

Also, I am quickly reaching the point where the only items left for me to
acquire are all the juicy high level items. (Ykeshas, EBWs, Fishbone Earing,
FBSS, etc) What other items are in the DragonWear(tm) 2000 Spring line?

Always looking to the horizon, I'd like to be well equiped for my first
dragon run. (In about 10 levels)

So far, I think I'm well enough equipped to take on Vox with an unbuffed
Cold resistance of 98 (2 Symbols of Loyalty to Vox +7 each, 2 Plat Peridot
Rings +10 each, Runed Bone Fork +10, Lambent Boots and Vambraces +2 each,
Cloak of the Ice Bear +20, Serpent Insignia Collar +5)

For Naggy, my situation is a little worse. Unbuffed I think I can get it to
65 haven't checked lately. (2 Plat Emerald Rings +10 each, Runed Bone Fork
+10, Firewalker Boots and Fiery Vambraces +5 each, Serpent Insignia Collar
+5)

For starters, I could pick up earings of fire and cold reflection (+5 each)
and I would love to get my hands on a crown of the froglok kings.

Well, since we're on equipment anyway, please allow me to ask all of your
advice on upgrades:

Ears: Opalline Earings (ac 2, +5 cha)
Neck: Serpent Insignia Collar (+5 vs all reisistances)
Face: Mask of Deception (ac 4, +7 vs magic, +13 cha)
Head: Skull Shaped Barbute (ac 13, +10 vs magic, +35 hp)

Fingers: Jagged Bands (ac 5, +3 str) or (Plat Peridot or Emerald rings ac 4,
+10 vs cold or fire)
Hands: Lambent Gauntlets (ac 12, +5 dex, +1 cha)
Wrist 1: Lambent Bracer (ac 9, +4 str, +1 cha)
Wrist 2: Silver Plated Bracer (ac 7, +5 vs Poison, +5 vs Disease) or Symbol
of Loyalty to Vox (ac 7, +7 vs cold)
Arms: Lambent Vambraces (ac 12, +2 vs all resistances, +1 cha)

Shoulders: Bloodstained Mantle (ac 6, +3 str, +10 vs magic) or Crested
Spaulders (ac 9, +5 sta)
Back: Cloak of the Icebear (ac 8, +15 hp, +20 vs cold)
Chest: Lambent Breast Plate (ac 20, +5 sta, +25 hp, +1 cha)
Legs: Lambent Greaves (ac 13, +5 agi, +1 cha) or Shin Greaves (ac 10, +5 vs
disease)
Feet: Lambent Boots (ac 12, +2 vs all resistances, +1 cha)

Melee Weapons: Sivery War Axe (dam 6, delay 22), Enameled Black Mace (dam 8,
delay 28), Dragoon Dirk (dam 6, delay 23, +3 vs magic, +2 dex), Obsidian
Shard (dam 6, delay 25, effect: Obsidian Shatter)

Instruments: Mistmore Battledrums, Mandolin, Minotaur Horn, Brass Horn

Ranged: Runed Bone Fork (dam 5, delay 29, +10 vs fire, +10 vs cold, +10 vs
magic)


Draelon Stormsong
Bard of the Tribunal
level 36

-----Original Message-----
From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 10:26 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent woes....


Huh? which item?

Runed Bone Fork is a great resist item - put it in your ranged slot for
MR+10 HR+10 CR+10 - DragonWear(tm)

Shimmering Orb is a great shield AC 15 HP+20 (weight 0.2) - next best shield
is a Bladestopper off Nagafen. (Do you think maybe there is a slight gap in
the loot?)

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Papa Legba" <legba@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 9:17 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent woes....


> I actually find the item a total mystery. People really pay up for it
> (I was offered 350P for mine), and I have no idea who wants it...
